nodes.text: New Republic Medal of Distinguished Public Service

The New Republic Medal of Distinguished Public Service was an honor that was awarded by the New Republic. By the time that he had served as head of law enforcement on the planet Hosnian Prime for four years, Commissioner Exantor Divo had received the honor three times.

The New Republic Medal of Distinguished Public Service was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
